tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My 3month old baby developed a cough which inspite of showing 3 different doctors was just not reducing , each time dose of medication and nebulisation was only being increased without any improvement in the baby. It was 2months into the cough and Finally after a friends recommendation visited dr Jagadish Chinnappa who examined the baby and advised to stop all nebulisation , explained the cause for cough and follow certain simple steps and medicines. Within 10 days time we could finally see improvement in the cough and we are very happy to say in a months time the cough stopped as well. 
Shall forever be grateful to dr Jagadish Chinappa.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Definitely recommend Dr. Jagadish Chinnappa with the vast experience he has.  He gets to the core of the issue and gives best advice

tags: Wait time,
review: We went to take a second opinion while our regular doctor was not around, and he told us our regular doctor is his student. Also he commented on my communication skills instead of just asking me to be more clear. He dismissed our concerns, didn't give the reports more than a passing glance. He is an experienced doctor, but he can do without making unnecessary comments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have recently relocated to Bangalore and were struggling to find a good paediatrician . Doctor Jagadish epitomizes the phrase  "experience speaks volumes" . The care and control doctor displayed really gave us the confidence that we have finally got a good doctor for our lil munchkin.  
Kindly note this is not casting aspersions  on other doctors ability ; it's just that we found what we were looking out for.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is one of the great doctor in Bangalore. He is understands the bigger picture of current situation of kid and he comes up with plan. And a great thing about this doctor is, he considers other available options and explains to the parents very clearly.

tags: None
review: When my son was 7-8 months, he was getting frequent cold and cough. I visited my regular paediatrician 5 times in that month, antibiotics were changed every time and my son was declared asthmatic. My friend suggested me to consult Dr. Jagadish Chinnappa and Dr. asked us to make some life style changes. Its been more than a year now and my son is fine. Can't thank him enough.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor is very very rude. His staff are even worse than the doctor. They are not helpful, extremely rude and unprofessional and talk to you with no respect and act like they are doing you favor. He charges Rs.1000 for consultation. ** ******** ** ******* *** ******* **** **** ** ***** ******* ** *** **** ** ** ******** ** *** ****** *** ****** ** ***** ** ***** **** *** ****** ***** *** ** *** ******* **** ********** ** ** ************* ***********

tags: None
review: Since our baby was born in Manipal, we visit this hospital once in a while for distinctive medical assistance. With Dr. Jagadish Chinnappa, it was an excellent session. His advice and cooperation have fulfilled all our medical requirements. We are happy with the experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is the one who gets to the root of problem and his eyes depicts ‘experience’. Since last 4 years he is our paediatrician for our daughter and now we are completely trusting him for our 2nd new born as well. *** **** **** ************* ** **** * *** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** **** ********Never prescribes unnecessary medicines or tests. 
Our son was suffering from severe ear infection, and was given heavy antibiotics.. but after completion of course still fever was coming..that time Dr.Jagdish took the call to stop medicine and to our surprise despite of the fluid in ear and no medicine our child started improving just with anti allergymedicine after 2 months of illness. He understood our worries and explained everything very nicely.

review:
Dr. Jagdish is very friendly and doesn't make the parent panic at any circumstance. He is approachable and ensures that he doesn't prescribe antibiotics unnecessarily which is really good compared to other doctors who do that. 

Expensive but worth the attention he gives.

tags: None
review: I've visited Dr. Chinappa previously so knew what to expect. The wait to see the doctor (about 40 mins) was longer than the last time.  No explanation given; no apology made; so I guess it's the norm! The waiting area can be improved; plenty of mosquitoes; even during the day;  which is not nice at all; especially in a health clinic for children.  The fees charged is not small; Rs.750 per consultation.

tags: None
review:
In today's world getting a good doctor means getting god. Medical Profession has become a way to make lots of money by cheating patients. Doctor's even don't care whether patient is a poor person or a rich person. what is his financial background. they cut all persons pocket in the same way without any mercy.

Dr. Jagadish Chinnappa is very very experienced and good doctor. ** ***** ******* ********** You can 100% believe him and no need to worry and go to another doctor. He does not write any unwanted medicine or test for making commission. 

Hats off to Doctor Jagadish Chinnappa.
May god Dr. Jagadish Chinnappa live long.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Paediatrics - Ortho,disorders of calcium and phosphorous metabolism,All Pediatric Problems ,
review:
*** ******** ** **** * *** ** *** My daughter is treated by him since she was 6 months. We were in Koramangla at that time and by stoke of luck we met Dr. Jagdeesh Chinappa. She is 13 years now and we have moved to Marathahalli, but whenever I am worried about any condition of her, he is my go to point. He has treated my daughter for normal viral fever, a dislocated elbow joint, EPV viral infection, growth disorder, knee pain, vomiting etc and whenever I go to him I am so satisfied and contended on my way back home. I am extremely happy and satisfied with Dr. Jagdeesh and would whole heartedly recommend him to all...

God bless him...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ************. My son used to fall sick often I had been to almost 6-7 doctors but after visiting Dr Jagdish my son was all fine. Now after 5 years didn't want to take a chance with my baby daughter, we shifted our house but still I go to him traveling almost 18 kms. He is very friendly n makes the baby/toddler very comfortable by talking to them giving them a pat n saying 'ur all fine just go and play' and calms us saying nothing to worry. He has all the patience to listen to all our concerns and gives good treatment. Despite his busy schedule he responds to the mails and messages. I am so thankful for getting such a great Dr for my children. Anyone who visits him will be will have a satisfying experience and will never go to any other Dr ** ** ***** **** ** ***** **** *** **** ** ********* ****** ** *** *** *** *****

tags: None
review: Senior & seasoned clinician; does not prescribe unnecessary antibiotics or other medications unless it is warranted.  Willing to spend the time to understand the problem and treat your child like a person instead of a number.  Tip:  to avoid long waits, call the office to find out if appointments are running on time or late.  Because of his seniority * ****** his appointments often run late due to emergency cases at the hospital, which are unavoidable.
